text:
Now, more than ever, Albertans need to stand together, as one community, in fighting this COVID-19 pandemic.

With a united voice, let us reject any un-Albertan attitudes of prejudice or discrimination that take away from our joint efforts to defeat this virus. https://t.co/QmwNQtskiW
